column4: ._. i have asked twice. and twice it has been pushed up. people, google hasnt helped me for the past 10 times i googled it. i NEED help.
i need to know how to make a USB drive bootable, and how to make GRUB2 boot it.
I've been waiting for about 10 hours with no response to my question, it's not unusual to be waiting forever for help here :) Just be patient.
i know that it takes a while, and thanks Loshki/ubottu
